page.title: 06SHOPPING IN RIPLEY
page.content: Ripley is a small town with many shops.There are shops that have been in Ripley for generations like Bowlers and Leary's butchers,and Palfree's the fish shop.There are new shops like Chinese take-aways,a kebab house and an Indian restaurant.There is a large Pricefighter Superstore,built just a few years ago.Then Kwiksave was built last year.Pricefighter is probably the most promising though as there is a car park handy for the shoppers.Wheras at Kwiksave there are no places for cars to go.Oxford Street is a very busy street.On Saturdays there are cars and people everywhere.75% of people we asked said that they would like it to be used by pedestrians only.Ripley Market is the main attraction on Friday and Saturday selling a large range of goods.
